website_summaries.verdict: As long as it fits, it's harder to find another robe as soft and comfortable and as high quality as this one for this price.
pros: Stands out for its herringbone texture, which enhances this robe's appearance and comfort level
Made from fine, durable microfiber yarns for added softness
cons: The one-size-fits-all approach doesn't always work well for smaller or larger consumers

customer_reviews.title: Ok for lounging, not for right after a showe
customer_reviews.text: It's an average product. I put it through the wash a couple times. The first time, as expected, shed a lot. Second time not as much, but still shed. The material is ok. I was looking more for a towel material, so to wear right after taking a shower. It's a little more furrier than a towel, but somewhat of a towel-like feel. It is warm to wear around the house. I should have also opted for a longer robe. If you're looking for something to just lounge around in the house, it would be good for you. I wouldn't use it though right after taking a shower, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ahha

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This robe looks nice at first glance, but this thing is poorly manufactured. It has strings hanging from ever seam. I have spent more time grooming it, hoping that it will not just start falling apart or rip, than I have worn it. You can get better made robes for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE Dirty and Damaged Out of the Package
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get a nice soft robe that matched my bathroom for when I get out of the shower. Well, you get what you pay for because right out of the package this robe had a green stain and several black and orange pieces crusted on. Tried to pick them off thinking they were lint but they clearly were not. And right out of the sealed plastic bag? Sketchy. Will be returning and investing in something worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Holt

customer_reviews.title: Completes the crazy cat lady ensemble
customer_reviews.text: I obviously missed the memor when buying a bathrobe became essential for adulthood and cozy-ness. Holy cow. All I do now is lounge around the house in my fuzzy bathrobe until I have to put on those dreaded outside clothes. This, paired with a cat on your lap while watching netflix and garfing down mac n cheese (with a glass of wine) is a proven cure all. Amazing. And yes, that is what a crazy cat lady would say.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Jaffa

customer_reviews.title: “Size fits most”
customer_reviews.text: I put this on and was like “omg what size did I order?” It’s tremendous. I’m 5’7 and 137 pounds. The sleeves are very long and the robe is tremendous. I’m keeping it though because it’s even softer than my Victoria’s Secret robe. It’s for getting out of the shower and sometimes laying around the house in while my hair dries. I LOVE the color and the material is beyond soft. However, the sleeves, yikes. How long do they think people’s arms are? I like it, but be aware is it very large. I wouldn’t recommend to anyone under 5’5.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality feel to it and extremely thin.. When I removed the tags by cutting the individual strings holding them in it also took off the loop for hangning on the door. The tags were huge and horribly uncomfortable so they had to be removed, didn't think that they'd actually sew it to the loop too. It's 100% polyester for those wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong robe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and I received 2 different robes. One was VERY small and POOR quality also it was NOT herringbone. It had a wavy pattern instead. The other robe was very NICE and it WAS the herringbone texture. If you get one and don't like it just double check that you got the right one.
customer_reviews.author: shantif

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and luxurious bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased these robes for my Airbnb to offer for guests. They feel very soft and well-made and most importantly hold up well in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think that it's okay but definitely not great. First the color
customer_reviews.text: I am torn for this bath robe. I think that it's okay but definitely not great. First the color: I picked blue because the other options (various pinks and white) are not for me. But well... it's just hmm. Then the material: It's soft enough that I feel good to wear it after shower. But it awkwardly absorbs water from my hair slightly too slowly, thereby letting the excess water run down a bit... Finally the closure: It has tie inside and outside. Even if you tied both, it will still open and show the boobies.. Maybe for tiny ladies, it won't. Maybe it will..
customer_reviews.author: Kim, the Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Fabric was super soft. I love it. Washed and it was still great. The reason for lower stars is that it arrived with about a 2 inch hole in the armpit of the robe.
customer_reviews.author: Missa024

customer_reviews.title: Best soft & affordable bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: You won't find this quality for this price elsewhere. This bathrobe is soft, cozy, and affordable! I purchased two as part of my warm welcoming to my house guest after a long day of travel. These bathrobes are plush like velvety cotton that feels like heaven on your skin. Although is not as thick as I would've desired it gives comfortable-and-stylish hotel kind of vibes.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice

customer_reviews.title: I've sampled a few!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few robes and have never been completely satisfied with the quality, style, or fit. I am sooooo glad that I took a leap and purchased this item. OMG super comfy, soft, great fit even though its a one size fits all. It truly does. I'm 5'8" so I struggle with finding clothes that's long enough to accommodate my long legs AND arms. I love this item so much that I'm ordering another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: RNB

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and oh so soft
customer_reviews.text: Robes, for me, are a very personal item. I've got one I use strickly for drying...and this one I bought for pure comfort. The color is so rich and the fabric is soft and light that I don't feel the weight of it at all. I'm 5'10" and this has sleeves that are actually long enough (rare find) and fall just to the knee. I'm impressed that it fits so well on a tall person...something that I usually don't see.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe It is very soft and warm enough ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint with this robe is that it is big. It is one size fits all and I'm a smaller person. Still, I love this robe It is very soft and warm enough for me to wear in the winter but not too warm. I wear it almost every day. It is hard to find a robe with both thickness and softness. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and warm! Pleasantly surprised with this product. Although I havent washed the product yet it looks like it will hold up well in the washer. I had to pull a few loose threads but didnt bother me. The length is great! I am 5'7" and 155 lbs. I also have a mom belly. It wraps all around me with plenty of room to spare. It reaches past my knee caps. Very soft and luxurious. Recomend 100%!! Worth the money and as nice as expensive robes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Are you really working from home if you don't own a robe?
customer_reviews.text: As I've transitioned to working from home during the COVID-19 pandemic... I realized that sometimes getting fully clothed just wasn't practical, so I set off to find the perfect robe from Amazon. This one takes the cake. It's soft and plush - reminiscent of a quality hotel robe - while not being too heavy or warm. It also washes and dries very nicely and the white is surprisingly stain resistant. (I may or may not have spilled red wine and then also smudged my makeup on this... strictly for research purposes, of course. So far so good. Not a stain in sight.) Purchase this, and never worry about the hassle of wearing pants again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Not for short people
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my boyfriend’s grandmother for Christmas to replace her current robe. It’s very soft and nice quality but the sleeves are so long! She’s a petit woman, probably only 5’2 at the most and she had to fold the sleeves 3 times to see her hands. She was able to hem the sleeves to fit her and she said she absolutely loves the robe now. Deducted a star because I wish it came in more sizes/petit sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aiken

customer_reviews.title: *CAUTION * “ONE SIZE FITS MOST” TOO LARGE
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION One size fits most, NOT accurate description !!! It is TOO LARGE. I am disappointed with the quality and the size issue. The sleeves are so long , I have to roll up several times , when I tie the robe both front pockets actually come together. You get what you pay for. 😢
customer_reviews.author: MariDan121112

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST COMFORTABLE ROBE i HAVE EVER HAD--YOU HAVE TO LOVE THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: This robe is beautiful, well made, unvelievably soft and warm. It is very well made and comfortable. The shawl collar easily wraps your neck or lays flat. I am 5' and it comes just below my knees. The sleeves are roomy, there is a large pocket on either side. waist ties inside assure proper closure with belt and loops on the sides. I am seriously thinking of buying several for 2020 Christmas gifts. One size fits all so it is a bit roomy overall for me but I prefer it over my other two robes. I love this robe
customer_reviews.author: DELORES L GALIAS

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, I'm ordering more, but uneven sleeves
customer_reviews.text: We experienced this robe at an Airbnb that supplied 2 in white for guest use. We loved them and came home and ordered one! While I'm glad I did (I love it! Just as soft and wonderful!) the right arm of the one I received (bright pink) is about 3in longer than the left arm (measured). Don't get me wrong, I love this robe and I'm about to order another one in white. Would definitely recommend this purchase for someone looking for comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Nehamazon

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Soft and luxurious. It's not full of static cling. It's bigger and roomier than I thought it would be, but bigger is always good in a robe. It's warm and toasty, yet lightweight and wrinkle-free. Let me end by saying this: If you LOVE her, buy her This. If you love yourself, buy yourself This. Well, either This or a Lexus. Maybe a villa in the south of France. But start with: This.
customer_reviews.author: Pureresearch

customer_reviews.title: This robe is reaaally soft but the material is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This robe is reaaally soft but the material is the kind that doesn't absorb water. So if you're wanting to use this as a robe in replacement of a towel after a shower, you're going to feel wet and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kang

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT a spa robe. NOT 100% cotton. NOT thick fabric. You can see thru it. NOT one size fits all. NOT, Not, not.........
customer_reviews.author: Target Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than most Resort robes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this robe for my girlfriend for a Christmas present and she absolutely loves it. The robe is very plush and soft and so far has been washed twice with no fraying but does have little white fluffs come off the first couple weeks. We found this product to be good quality and would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: donald c. parker

customer_reviews.title: Self Care Investment
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this after getting out of a bath and toweling off in winter or waking up with coffee or lounging about playing games or walking my dog. Easy to wash and size appropriately. No complaints. I was not compensated in any fashion for this review. I like to provide open, honest and transparent feedback on products I like to try. If you found this review helpful, please click the ‘Helpful’ button to let myself and others know that it has helped you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Bathrobe For Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I got for my wife for Christmas and she just open the package. The sticking on the arms was not completely done and there was a lot of hanging threads all over the garment. She has stage four lung cancer and was very happy to get the items that I got her and even with the way it is she wouldn't let me send it back. Please look at your items before you send them out. I also the new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe because I am currently pregnant and do not like wearing clothes and let me say that this robe is AMAZING. it is incredibly soft, and warm. I am unsure of how absorbent it is due to it being light weight and me not wanting to add anything wet to it. I will know when I wash it and put it in the dryer in which case I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Essentialmom

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Holes in it. Loop torn. Ties ripped off. I’m only keeping it because I just wear it around the house for a little warmth. 1 star because it is soft. Unless you like sewing things don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Would not absorb moisture at all. But soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no absorbency. It’s more of a fluffy blanket. Couldn’t use it after I got out of my hottub. Wouldn’t absorb. And also didn’t dry off by the next morning. But comfy and fluffy. So if you don’t need it to absorb extra moisture then this product will work for you
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Baddick

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be good for right out of shower
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be good for right out of shower, it was not. Does not absorb water, it is fairly warm but not unisex. Feels kinda like hopping out of shower and putting on a bunny suit. A little short for a guy. It is soft. Would work the best if u just want to lounge around in a robe for some reason or have a robe as part of Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this robe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this robe. It is so super soft and comfy. I'm giving 5 stars because of that. The sizing would get one star unless the model is 6'5". I'm 5'2" and the robe almost goes to my ankles and the arms are at least 6 inches past my wrist. I look like a kid playing dress up.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingAddict

customer_reviews.title: Don't wash with other clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Just don't wash it with any of your other clothes. I made the mistake of doing so, and got all my clothes stained and left with the fake flurry material stuff this thing was made with. Emptied my drayer's vent, nothing but pink flurry stuff stuck to it.
customer_reviews.author: ZK Sesay

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. Great for new moms.
customer_reviews.text: This robe is extremely soft. It’s not really meant for putting on a soon as you get out of the shower because it’s not made of Terry cloth but it’s wonderful after you’ve towel dried when you just want something cozy to be in for a while. I bought this my first week from the hospital after baby number three. It’s perfect when your boobs are supersensitive from nursing when a regular towel feels like sandpaper. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe as a gift for my wife, knowing that she wanted a nice soft robe at the right length. She's a little on the shorter side at 5'2", so my main concern was the length/fit, but there were zero issues there. She loves the robe, the material is incredibly soft, and the quality is surprisingly good for this price. I would definitely recommend you try this one out!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Thielen

customer_reviews.title: Not for the shower or pool
customer_reviews.text: The material is not at all like a bath towel. It’s more like a plush / velvety stuffed animal. If you’re looking for something for after the shower or pool, this won’t work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Student

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Kind of dissatisfied its a nice robe but when my girlfriend opened it. It had a hole in the sleeve
customer_reviews.author: William Sunderman III

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. These robes are a joy to wear. Very plush, very soft and warm. They are not the highest finish quality, but more than adequate for my home use. I will buy more and get them monogrammed for members of my family.
customer_reviews.author: OKF

customer_reviews.title: Too bright, not herringbone,
customer_reviews.text: It's an exceedingly bright, metallic, and juvenile pink. It's also clearly not herringbone, as other reviewers have pointed out. Finally, texture wise it is so fuzzy that it is too warm to wear after showering (I take hot showers) and oddly sticky feeling.
customer_reviews.author: twelve-ferries

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft, warm and pretty. But sewing/seam quality is just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly soft, comfortable and very pretty color. If it were a clothing item that I wore in public I'd give it 2 stars for poor sewing quality because one of the inner ties came off the second time I tied it (Easily sewed back on), and one of the shoulder seams has developed a large hole after 2 months of daily wear and many washes (easy repair if you sew). Because I only wear it at home, I'll give it 3 stars for its extreme softness and comfort, despite the poor sewing quality. The price was right, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, Sheds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Amazon won’t let me add photos but overall It’s just ok. I got the red one which looks more pinkish than red but it’s ok. The quality isn’t the best honestly but for the price I guess it’s decent. Definitely invest more of your money in those 30-60$ robes if you want some really good quality cause this ain’t it. Also the comments about the shedding? It does shed A LOT. Beware if you have white carpet/rug/comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impulsive Purchase After Dumb Boy Made Me Sad
customer_reviews.text: ok a boy was making my head and my heart hurt and my anxiety was consuming me as per usual so i impulsively purchased this bath robe which is my favorite color and it has increased my quality of life in ways i couldn’t even imagine! super soft and well made and could really fit anyone! It’s super warm and comfy without being smothering !!! thank you
customer_reviews.author: Megan nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this robe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest robe! I’m obsessed with it. It is so cozy and it also looks really nice! Luxurious without needing to pay a high price! I’d buy more if I needed to, or will definitely buy it as a gift at some point!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser521

customer_reviews.title: Sheds so badly!
customer_reviews.text: As a moderately sized woman I thought a one size fits most would be fine. It's quite large. Not at all cute. Not the end of the world though as I needed something to easily cover up to use the bathroom or get a snack when my roommate is home. The real reason I'm not giving this a great review is how badly it sheds! Will not be able to use it after I get out of the shower, which was half the reason I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: keipper

customer_reviews.title: My Soft Friend
customer_reviews.text: My hubby gave me this as a gift 💝 and I am so much in love. Currently i am expecting and this soft robe just makes my life so comfortable. Lenght of the robe is perfect and very light weight. From hands it is little longer but i fold it so not much issue.
customer_reviews.author: Vivacious Wish

customer_reviews.title: Soft & plush
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I would like it because I’m partial to cotton but I like the soft plush feel & I like it better than terry cloth & it washed up so fluffy. It really changed my mind about what I like In fabrics...I think I’ll use this fine as my standard in my guest house
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe as a gift for a coworker. When I got it it had a hole in the sleeve at one of the seams and it was covered in all kinds of threads and Lindt. Definitely not worth the money. I’m glad I opened it up before I packaged it to give it to her I would’ve been so embarrassed if she got this in that condition
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: The robe feels great when you touch it with your hand
customer_reviews.text: The robe feels great when you touch it with your hand. But when you put it on and your skin is damp, it feels like the fabric just sits on your wet skin and doesn't absorb and water. I will not wear it when I just get out of the shower, which is when I want to put on a robe to warm me.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because when it arrived it had loos strings and red fuzzies on it; also, it was more like a thin blanket than a bath robe. It is pretty see through and feels like a dollar store blanket. Not usable at all in a spa or bath environment.
customer_reviews.author: keren w

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to wet skin.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, but not really a good "toweling" robe for after a shower. The fabric sticks to wet skin.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Corsi

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE! It drowns me. The sleeves are a good 6 inches to long. The color is peach not pink. But it's so soft and warm. I roll the sleeves up and enjoy wearing on these cold winter nights.
customer_reviews.author: Love of shopping

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was really surprised by how much I loved this robe. Given the price being so low I didn't expect the whole lot and that was okay. So, to receive something so soft, plush and comfortable I was very pleased. Unfortunately ,they didn't have the other colors that I liked but as soon as they do I will get another one.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this robe originally because of the price but the quality exceeded expectations. I would recommend to others-- It runs a bit large, but I like a robe that is a little roomy--
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Soft and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m in live with this robe, not heavy, not hot. it’s super soft, I was a bit worried it wouldn’t fit because I’m plus size but it fits great. Don’t recommend putting it on when your body still wet though, other than that it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Korali

customer_reviews.title: Very lite weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a ok robe for the price. I personally wanted a terry cloth all cotton robe, the kind they give you in a nice hotel. This is not heavy cotton and best way to describe it Is discount to high / medium end. I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Dra

customer_reviews.title: Recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, Nice color!!! I love it because the thickness is just right. Not too thick like winter sweater and not too thin like swimming pool gown. However, there was a little bit of dust/fur coming out on the first few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Huynh Bui

customer_reviews.title: dirty in a spot it wouldn’t have been on packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I misread it and thought it had a towel texture. It was very soft upon touch and felt light weight. It was folded in half and hooked with the plastic. When I pulled it open the bottom of the robe was folded in and has some stains. It made me think it was used and they just re-packaged it and sold it as new. I don’t mind buying something used but at least clean it and price it as a used and returned item. Not a new one. Such a bummer. It’s a pain in the ass to return so I’ll just wash and keep it. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take to the hospital when I had my baby girl. She was taken after delivery due to breathing issues and put in the nursery. This robe is super soft and came in handy when I wanted to go to the nursery but didn't want to put on a bunch of clothes. It's soft, warm, and cozy. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylinn

customer_reviews.title: Giant sized
customer_reviews.text: I'm a petite woman (5ft/ 120lbs) and was swimming in this - had to return. Arms about 8in. too long, and so wide around that it was bulky in an uncomfortable sort of way. So sad because it's so super soft and I love the herringbone pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Expert

customer_reviews.title: Not how it appears but still nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me. And it's nice. Its soft, and warm. But it is far shorter than the picture leads you to believe. And i do not like that the tie is more up on the chest and not around the waist like it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and the pockets are my favorite. Color came as expected. Only thing is that it definitely has a lot of static but thats to be expected with the material
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thai

customer_reviews.title: Luv this robe!
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. The. Softest. Perfect length and the subtle pattern of the fabric makes it look and feel high-end. Definitely worth it for a soft, light to medium light weight robe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and attractive. Bought it for my wife after our honeymoon venue had robes for us. My wife loves it and wears it every night and sometimes days too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s so soft and great!! The only thing I would change is that sometimes the neckline comes up too high and can get really dirty with makeup and things. But it cleans really well and I basically live in it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short AF
customer_reviews.text: I'm only 5 foot 1 and it is short on me. Hits just under the bum. Can't imagine a taller person wearing this it would hit at the waist like a fitted jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived with a hole in the shoulder, but I still wear it. I love robes and wanted a shorter one that was still fuzzy for spring time. It's very soft and despite the hole I don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I like to wear it on the way to and from ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a terry cloth robe but this is more fuzzy. I like to wear it on the way to and from my hot tub but it is super cold when wet, unlike terry cloth that soaks up the water better. My fault for not reading the description better. I love the color and fit though. Just didn't work as well as I'd hoped for my needs. I'm getting a new terry cloth one and will keep this one for guests.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: because the robe displayed looks like light pink and the color says bright pink
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today.. It IS very soft, but also thin. It's not really textured as the description says and picture shows. And the tag does not say "Herringbone Textured Plush Robe" but instead just says "Herringbone Plush Robe." And the color is definitely not the same! I did question it, because the robe displayed looks like light pink and the color says bright pink. It is definitely bright pink! We'll see if it washes well! I saw some reviews where the robe got pink fluff everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe!
customer_reviews.text: I got this robe in white and I love it! It’s so soft and comfortable, I basically live in it! I’m 5’2” and it’s the perfect length! Not too short but also not all the way down to my ankles either
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Quality comfort
customer_reviews.text: This robe is exactly what I was looking for! I don’t like fleece robes but wanted something similar in comfort. This robe is the best! I love the material and it is very comfortable. Would buy again for self or others in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Color is photo is misleading, but robe is comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I really like this robe but the coloring in the photo is nowhere near the coloring that I got. I received a color much more similar to sky blue than green. I didn't mind the color so I kept it, but the photo is misleading. The robe is very soft and comfortable but it's not super plush, the material is a little thin. Overall it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elle B.

customer_reviews.title: This robe: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Felt cheap, pretty thin, and lots of fuzzies coming off it. It gets two stars cause it’s actually about what I thought I’d get for the price, I was just hoping it was a diamond in the rough. It wasn’t. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Glover

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This robe is actually really big. I got the smallest size possible but it was still huge on me and the sleeves were very long.
